mainTask: Write an article about the benefits of travelling

agents.agentName: Agent for Brainstorm and list potential benefits of travelling
agents.taskAssigned: Brainstorm and list potential benefits of travelling

agents.agentName: Agent for Research the chosen benefits in detail (e.g., stress reduction, personal growth, cultural understanding)
agents.taskAssigned: Research the chosen benefits in detail (e.g., stress reduction, personal growth, cultural understanding)

agents.agentName: Agent for Find supporting evidence and statistics for each benefit (e.g., studies, articles, travel blogs)
agents.taskAssigned: Find supporting evidence and statistics for each benefit (e.g., studies, articles, travel blogs)

agents.agentName: Agent for Create an outline for the article, structuring the benefits logically
agents.taskAssigned: Create an outline for the article, structuring the benefits logically

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the introduction to the article
agents.taskAssigned: Write the introduction to the article

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the body paragraphs, each focusing on a specific benefit with supporting evidence
agents.taskAssigned: Write the body paragraphs, each focusing on a specific benefit with supporting evidence

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the conclusion summarizing the key benefits of travelling
agents.taskAssigned: Write the conclusion summarizing the key benefits of travelling

agents.agentName: Agent for Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity
agents.taskAssigned: Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity

agents.agentName: Agent for Format the article for readability (headings, subheadings, images, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Format the article for readability (headings, subheadings, images, etc.)
